value: content=Visit the imposing casino, an architectural masterpiece right in the centre of town that now celebrates its centenary.
San Remo Casino has become particularly well known for its hosting of the three times yearly Italian Poker Tour and the European Poker Tour
. Competitors can buy in for a range of tournaments from €300 up to €5300 or simply spectate the huge amounts of money being gambled. First place in the EPT is over €1M.
